entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kootenay (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -25.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -29.0°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
